tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (ADVP (RB never)) (VBD noticed) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB how) (JJ long)) (S (NP (PRP$ my) (NN hair)) (VP (VBZ is) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (JJ curly)) (: :) (NP (NN o))))))))))))
